properties.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
properties.headline: Blowing Dust Advisory issued February 29 at 3:35AM PST until February 29 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* CHANGES...No changes.

* WHAT...For the Blowing Dust Advisory, visibility between one
quarter mile and one mile in blowing dust expected. For the
Lake Wind Advisory, west winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to
35 mph expected. Waves 2 to 3 feet on Pyramid Lake.

* WHERE...Western Nevada for the Blowing Dust Advisory. Pyramid
Lake for the Lake Wind Advisory.

* WHEN...For the Blowing Dust Advisory, from 10 AM to 10 PM PST
Saturday. For the Lake Wind Advisory, from 1 PM to 7 PM PST
Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to reduced
visibility in blowing dust on roads such as Interstate 80 and
Highways 50 and 95. Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will
be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until
conditions improve.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southwest to west winds of 20 to 30 mph
with gusts 40 to 50 mph will create areas of cross winds along
Interstate 80 and along U.S. 95.
properties.instruction:
Be prepared for sudden decreases in visibility to near zero. If
you encounter a wall of dust, slow down and leave plenty of space
between you and the car in front of you.

Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a
sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing
boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

NWSheadline: BLOWING DUST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM PST THIS EVENING FOR PYRAMID LAKE
